queue.title: mdi engagement broken — write failure detected in session. Investigate and fix auth/API.

outcome.note: MDI API changed 4 endpoints: fragments→contribute, questions→oracle/questions, score→upvote/downvote, dream seed content→topic. Updated mdi.js component. All 29 tests pass. Live API write verified.

queue.title: Consolidate session-type-conditional hooks sharing 80%+ logic
queue.description: Many hooks have _B.sh, _E.sh, _R.sh, _A.sh suffixes but share most of their logic. Identify hook groups where a single parameterized hook with a session-type switch can replace 2-4 type-specific hooks. Start with post-session hooks (session-history writer, compliance trackers). Each consolidation reduces hook count by 1-3, directly supporting d070's target of 67 or fewer hooks.

outcome.note: Consolidated 4 hooks into 2: E-posthook absorbed covenant-update and scope-bleed (31, 37); cost-trend-monitor merged B and R trend hooks (28). Hook count 89→86. Remaining groups (B pre-session dispatcher, E pre-session dispatcher, R audit merger) tracked in wq-729.

queue.title: Add health.violation webhook event type
queue.description: Wire threshold violations from /status/api-health into the webhooks system. When violations are first detected, fire a health.violation event so subscribed agents get push notifications instead of polling. Extends wq-721 work.

queue.title: Batch python3→jq migration for complex post-session hooks
queue.description: wq-718 migrated 5 simple_json hooks. 11 complex post-session hooks remain: 10-summarize, 13-ctxly-summary, 15-cost-pipeline, 17-engagement-log, 19-session-debrief, 25-directive-audit, 26-engage-blockers, 26-session-trace, 32-compress-logs, 33-queue-archive, 36-e-session-posthook_E. These need individual analysis — some may need partial node rewrites rather than pure jq replacement.

queue.title: Hook consolidation batch 2: B pre-session, E pre-session, R audit dispatchers
queue.description: Continue wq-727. Remaining groups: (1) B pre-session dispatcher merging 45-truncation-detect, 46-queue-title-lint, 46-stuck-items, 49-pipeline-nudge into single hook; (2) E pre-session dispatcher merging 35-engagement-liveness, 36-engagement-seed, 36-topic-clusters; (3) R pre-session merger of 35-maintain-audit and 35-security-posture. Each reduces 2-4 hooks → 1. Expected total reduction: 86 → ~79.
